alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 6:49PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade County through 730 PM EDT... At 649 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Miccosukee Resort to near Richmond West. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hialeah, The Redland, Kendall, Doral, Hialeah Gardens, Pinecrest, Sweetwater, Medley, Westchester, Glenvar Heights, Richmond West, Fountainbleau, Richmond Heights, Country Walk, Kendale Lakes, Palmetto Bay, Cutler Bay, Zoo Miami, Goulds and The Hammocks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
